title: Crime on the streets
brief_description: This film recounts the high occurence of street crimes, including theft, burglary, assault and rape. Shows how the behaviour of victim often encourages criminals. Suggests ways of protecting the individuals as well as his/her property from attack. Featuring an interview with Chuck Norris.
